overview:
Experienced in running and growing venture capital backed, technology orientated businesses.

Past six years focused on the development of online publishing and web services to deliver content and process improvement in biopharma and healthcare.

Current activities include developing technology and marketing partnerships, and for managing strategic relationships with key pharmaceutical corporate clients.

Major interest in the convergence between online media, web applications and mobile devices as a disruptive tecnology.

Paul Hartiganâ€™s Specialties: Strategy, marketing and growth of online publishing and e-marketing in biopharma, and consumer health space, and ehealth in general
